about_the_game:
Embark on a captivating grid-based dungeon crawler adventure as you join Puda and The Kid on a journey through the treacherous realms of Eldo.



Traverse dense forests, ascend towering temples, and brave scorching deserts. Battle bizarre foes and uncover long-lost secrets in turn-based combat.



Customize your party, create powerful weapons, and chart the unexplored territories of Eldo. Immerse yourself in the captivating tale of "Puda and The Kid" and unravel the mysteries within.

Embark on an unforgettable adventure in "Puda and The Kid" and discover what lies within the enigmatic realms of Eldo.
